content:
Text summary of US CarePlan says:

a fixed Careplan.category.coding.system= “http://hl7.org/fhir/us/CodeSystem/careplan-category”

Differential says:

us-core-1: Must have a category of 'assess-plan' and a code system 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/careplan-category'

One of the URLs has core inside it, one doesn't. Where would I report the bug?
@Vadim Peretokin GForge with US Core for Specification Thanks
